reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Vocational Training and Economic Empowerment Program for Women Workers

description.narrative: Project Description Securing a fixed source of income for 200 poor women by qualifying them with a profession or handicraft and enabling them to create an income-generating project, through which this family can be transformed from a poor dependent family into a self-sufficient productive family to live in dignity.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

description.narrative: Project Description Securing a fixed source of income for 200 poor women by qualifying them with a profession or handicraft and enabling them to create an income-generating project, through which this family can be transformed from a poor dependent family into a self-sufficient productive family to live in dignity.
